metadata.name: 2 5 Travasol Amino Acid Injection With Electrolytes In 10 Dextrose 0 25 g mL Solution

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: L Threonine makes up collagen elastin and enamel protein It aids proper fat metabolism in the liver helps the digestive and intestinal tracts function more smoothly and assists in metabolism and assimilation

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: L Threonine is an essential amino acid that helps to maintain the proper protein balance in the body It is important for the formation of collagen elastin and tooth enamel and aids liver and lipotropic function when combined with aspartic acid and methionine
